isha's suggestion for structure

* university/
* ├── app.py
* ├── database.db
* ├── templates/
* │   ├── login.html
* │   ├── student_dashboard.html
* │   ├── teacher_dashboard.html
* │   ├── teacher_class.html
* │   └── admin (auto-generated by Flask-Admin)
* └── static/
*    ├── styles.css
*    └── script.js
